snippet.title: Abandon Ship: Major Update 05: The Spider Islands
snippet.description:
Explore three new regions in the latest Major Update for Abandon Ship:

- The Spider Islands. Fight off giant arachnids as they drop onto your vessel. Be mindful of your actions in quests, as some outcomes may result in them spreading beyond the region... 
- Cannibal's Lurk. The savages that inhabit this region will attack any ship, but are they just defending their territory from aggressive settlers?
- Peril's Cauldron. Strange weapons can be found in this region, for those brave enough to go looking for them.

New weapons and ship customisation options, plus a whole lot more await!

Out now Steam Early Access ► http://store.steampowered.com/app/551860

Official Soundtrack available now ► 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/848370/Abandon_Ship__Official_Soundtrack/

FOLLOW US:
Official Website ► http://abandonshipgame.com/ 
Twitter ►  https://twitter.com/GameAbandonShip
Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/AbandonShipTheGame/
Discord ► https://discord.gg/abandonship
YouTube ► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6FGX1jCxMUqdlB_d6KsztQ

Subscribe to our Newsletter and get your name in the game! See http://abandonshipgame.com/your-name-in-the-game for details.
